name: FUELING
description:
Game's purpose: You are trying to get fuels (important red fuels are kinda bad so try to avoid them ) and gain score. If you run out of fuel, you lose...

This is the game which you can spend your time without looking time.You will always try to pass your highscore. I'm just saying this game is really catchy. Download or don't download it is your choice.But if you download once you will be addicted to this game

Controls:

A/D keys

left/right arrow keys

mouse left/right buttons
